indirectInputs.name: mysqlIndirectInput
ddlStatements: CREATE TABLE label (id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,created_by varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,created_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,updated_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,PRIMARY KEY (id),UNIQUE KEY name (name));

CREATE TABLE offer (id varchar(255) NOT NULL,data mediumtext,created_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,updated_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE offer_query (id varchar(255) NOT NULL,status varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,format varchar(255) NOT NULL,classification varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,label varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,start_time datetime DEFAULT NULL,end_time datetime DEFAULT NULL,owner varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,created_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,updated_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,version int(255) DEFAULT 0,ea_status varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (id),KEY status (status),KEY format (format),KEY classification (classification),KEY label (label),KEY start_time (start_time),KEY end_time (end_time),KEY owner (owner),KEY updated_at (updated_at));

CREATE TABLE outbound_message_groups (id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, group_id varchar(100) NOT NULL, expires_at datetime NOT NULL, sidelined tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, created_at datetime DEFAULT NULL, updated_at datetime DEFAULT NULL, exchange_name varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id), KEY index_outbound_message_groups_on_expires_at_and_sidelined (expires_at, sidelined), KEY index_outbound_message_groups_on_exchange_name (exchange_name), KEY idx_outbound_messages_group (group_id, exchange_name))

CREATE TABLE outbound_messages (id bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,message_id varchar(100) NOT NULL,relayed tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,relayed_at datetime DEFAULT NULL,exchange_name varchar(100) NOT NULL,message mediumtext,created_at datetime DEFAULT NULL,updated_at datetime DEFAULT NULL,inbound_message_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL,exchange_type varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,app_id varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,correlation_id varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,group_id varchar(100) NOT NULL,http_method varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,http_uri varchar(4096) DEFAULT NULL,reply_to varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,reply_to_http_method varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL,reply_to_http_uri varchar(4096) DEFAULT NULL,txn_id varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,routing_key varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,context text,destination_response_status int(11) DEFAULT NULL,relay_error varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,retries int(11) DEFAULT 0,custom_headers text,PRIMARY KEY (id),UNIQUE KEY index_outbound_messages_on_message_id (message_id),KEY index_outbound_messages_on_group_id (group_id),KEY index_outbound_messages_on_relayed (relayed),KEY index_outbound_message_on_relayed_at (relayed_at),KEY exchange_name (exchange_name),KEY idx_outbound_messages (group_id,exchange_name,relayed));

CREATE TABLE tnc (id int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,tnc_for varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,offer_format varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,tnc_data text,tnc_type varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,created_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,active tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL,updated_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,tnc_meta varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,tnc_data_type varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (id),KEY tnc_meta (tnc_meta));
